haxegui

haxegui.managers.LayoutManager

type
class
available in
flash9
LayoutManager handles loading layouts from XML files, and setting a layout.

Static Variables

public lastLoaded : String

public layouts : Hash<Xml>

Static Methods

public fetchLayout(url : String, ?cb : Bool -> Void) : Void

parameters
url Path to layout file
cb Function callback which gets a true (success) or false (fail)
Convenience method for loading a style from a url.

public loadLayouts(xml : Xml) : Void

Load all layouts in an XML document.

private onXmlLoaded(cb : Bool -> Void, e : flash.events.Event) : Void

fetchLayout handler

public reload() : Void

Reload last layout.

public setLayout(name : String) : Void

Set the current layout.
